name: Orange to Juice Puzzle
description:
Orange to Juice Puzzle game is a very beautiful and simple puzzle game.

The objective of the game is to help the slices of orange to roll their way from the puzzle and reach to the juice box. The offers simple physics based puzzle for the player to solve.

The player has the ability to create platforms by drawing on the screen. When you touch the screen, a line will start to form and when you release the touch, a straight line will be formed and now the orange slices will start to interact with this line.

You can tap on the line to remove it if you have created a wrong line.

You have unlimited number of orange slices and you need to make a certain number of slices reach the juice box for the level to be complete.

The game offers very colorful graphics for the players to enjoy. there is to time limit to solving the puzzle so take your time to enjoy the juicy puzzle.
